verses.text: Again in the ninth year , in the tenth month , in the tenth \add day\add* of the month , the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , write thee the name of the day , \add even\add* of this same day : the king of Babylon set himself against Jerusalem this same day.
And utter a parable unto the rebellious house , and say unto them, Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Set on a pot , set \add it\add* on , and also pour water into it:
Gather the pieces thereof into it, \add even\add* every good piece , the thigh , and the shoulder ; fill \add it\add* with the choice bones.
Take the choice of the flock , and burn also the bones under it, \add and\add* make it boil well , and let them seethe the bones of it therein.\f + \fr 24.5 \ft burn: or, heap\f* \p

¶ Wherefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Woe to the bloody city , to the pot whose scum \add is\add* therein, and whose scum is not gone out of it! bring it out piece by piece ; let no lot fall upon it.
For her blood is in the midst of her; she set it upon the top of a rock ; she poured it not upon the ground , to cover it with dust ;
That it might cause fury to come up to take vengeance ; I have set her blood upon the top of a rock , that it should not be covered.
Therefore thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Woe to the bloody city ! I will even make the pile for fire great.
Heap on wood , kindle the fire , consume the flesh , and spice it well , and let the bones be burned.
Then set it empty upon the coals thereof, that the brass of it may be hot , and may burn , and \add that\add* the filthiness of it may be molten in it , \add that\add* the scum of it may be consumed.
She hath wearied \add herself\add* with lies , and her great scum went not forth out of her: her scum \add shall be\add* in the fire.
In thy filthiness \add is\add* lewdness : because I have purged thee, and thou wast not purged , thou shalt not be purged from thy filthiness any more, till I have caused my fury to rest upon thee.

I the 
d \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*
d* have spoken \add it:\add* it shall come to pass , and I will do \add it;\add* I will not go back , neither will I spare , neither will I repent ; according to thy ways , and according to thy doings , shall they judge thee, saith the Lord 
d \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*
d*. \p
¶ Also the word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,
Son of man , behold, I take away from thee the desire of thine eyes with a stroke : yet neither shalt thou mourn nor weep , neither shall thy tears run down.\f + \fr 24.16 \ft run down: Heb. go\f*

Forbear to cry , make no mourning for the dead , bind the tire of thine head upon thee, and put on thy shoes upon thy feet , and cover not \add thy\add* lips , and eat not the bread of men.\f + \fr 24.17 \ft Forbear: Heb. Be silent\f*\f + \fr 24.17 \ft lips: Heb. upper lip\f*
So I spake unto the people in the morning : and at even my wife died ; and I did in the morning as I was commanded. \p
¶ And the people said unto me, Wilt thou not tell us what these \add things are\add* to us, that thou doest \add so\add*?
Then I answered them, The word of the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd* came unto me, saying ,

Speak unto the house of Israel , Thus saith the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*; Behold, I will profane my sanctuary , the excellency of your strength , the desire of your eyes , and that which your soul pitieth ; and your sons and your daughters whom ye have left shall fall by the sword.\f + \fr 24.21 \ft that…: Heb. the pity of your soul\f*
And ye shall do as I have done : ye shall not cover \add your\add* lips , nor eat the bread of men.
And your tires \add shall be\add* upon your heads , and your shoes upon your feet : ye shall not mourn nor weep ; but ye shall pine away for your iniquities , and mourn one toward another.
Thus Ezekiel is unto you a sign : according to all that he hath done shall ye do : and when this cometh , ye shall know that I \add am\add* the Lord \nd \+w GOD|strong="H3069"\+w*\nd*.

Also, thou son of man , \add shall it\add* not \add be\add* in the day when I take from them their strength , the joy of their glory , the desire of their eyes , and that whereupon they set their minds , their sons and their daughters ,\f + \fr 24.25 \ft that…: Heb. the lifting up of their soul\f*
\add That\add* he that escapeth in that day shall come unto thee, to cause \add thee\add* to hear \add it\add* with \add thine\add* ears ?

In that day shall thy mouth be opened to him which is escaped , and thou shalt speak , and be no more dumb : and thou shalt be a sign unto them; and they shall know that I \add am\add* the \nd \+w LORD|strong="H3068"\+w*\nd*.
